fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints

Class BCMCompositeEndPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.CompositeEndPoint
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.BCMCompositeEndPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractEndPointI, BCMCompositeEndPointI, CompositeEndPointI, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeURIServiceEndpoint

    public abstract class BCMCompositeEndPoint
extends CompositeEndPoint
implements BCMCompositeEndPointI
    The class BCMCompositeEndPoint implements specialisation of generic composite end points to the BCM4Java case.

    Description

    The only addition to the implementation of generic composite end point is the type verification made as pre- and postconditions in the redefinition of the getEndPoint(Class<I>) method.

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2024-07-12

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:

      • BCMCompositeEndPoint

        public BCMCompositeEndPoint(int numberOfEndPoints)
        initialise a BCMMultiEndPoints instance.

        Contract

         pre     numberOfEndPoints > 1
 post    !serverSideInitialised()
 post    !clientSideInitialised()
        Parameters:
        numberOfEndPoints - number of expected end points in this multiple end point.

      • BCMCompositeEndPoint

        protected BCMCompositeEndPoint(java.util.ArrayList<EndPointI<?>> initialEndPoints)
        create a new multiple end points with the given end points; to be used to implement the method copyWithSharable.

        Contract

         pre     initialEndPoints != null
 pre     initialEndPoints.stream().allMatch(e -> !e.serverSideInitialised())
 pre     initialEndPoints.stream().allMatch(e -> !e.clientSideInitialised())
 pre     initialEndPoints.stream().allMatch(e -> e instanceof BCMEndPoint<?>)
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        initialEndPoints - end points to be put in the multiple end points.
